data.description: Tap2Table is a QR-based ordering system that streamlines restaurant operations and enhances the dining experience. Customers can scan a QR code on their table to access a digital menu, place orders, and track their status—all from their smartphones. This eliminates physical menus, reduces wait times, and improves hygiene.For restaurant owners, Tap2Table provides an intuitive admin panel to manage menus, orders, tables, and sales analytics. Real-time order tracking enhances customer satisfaction, while integrated sales insights help optimize pricing and boost profits.With Tap2Table, restaurants can offer a seamless, contactless dining experience, improving service efficiency and customer engagement. Perfect for cafés and restaurants of all sizes, it’s the ideal solution for modernizing food service.
